content.text:
# American Music Award of Merit

The American Music Award of Merit is given to artists who have made "truly exceptional contributions" to the music industry.
2020s
*2025: Not Awarded
*2022: Not Awarded
*2021: Not Awarded
*2020: Not Awarded
2010s
*2019: Not Awarded
*2018: Not Awarded
*2017: Not Awarded
*2016: Sting
*2015: Not Awarded
*2014: Not Awarded
*2013: Not Awarded
*2012: Not Awarded
*2011: Not Awarded
*2010: Not Awarded
2000s
*2009: Not Awarded
*2008: Annie Lennox
*2007: Not Awarded
*2006: Not Awarded
*2005: Not Awarded
*2004: Bon Jovi
*2003 (November): Not Awarded
*2003 (January): Alabama
*2002: Garth Brooks
*2001: Janet Jackson
*2000: Gloria Estefan
1990s

*1998: Frank Sinatra
*1997: Little Richard
*1996: Tammy Wynette
*1995: Prince
*1994: Whitney Houston
*1993: Bill Graham
*1992: James Brown
*1991: Merle Haggard
*1990: Neil Diamond
1980s
*1989: Willie Nelson
*1988: The Beach Boys
*1987: Elvis Presley
*1986: Paul McCartney
*1985: Loretta Lynn
*1984: Michael Jackson
*1983: Kenny Rogers
*1982: Stevie Wonder
*1981: Chuck Berry
